T02D1616:143a-1: shr'i tsa tu:p'i tha s'a dh'a no pi ka / bod skad du /
T02D1616:143a-2: dpal gdan bzhi pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1616:143a-3: thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1616:143a-4: dngos dang dngos med ngang las dpe mtshan ldan//
T02D1616:143b-0: @143b de las 'gro ba'i don mdzad la btud de //
T02D1616:143b-1: bcu dang gsum po mngon du bya ba'i thabs //
T02D1616:143b-2: rgyud na mi gsal bsdus te bri bar bya //
T02D1616:143b-3: de la re zhig slob dpon bum pa dang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing /
T02D1616:143b-5: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub thob par phya ba'i phyir 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1616:143b-6: yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs kyi //
T02D1616:143b-7: gnas dag tu ni bsten nas su //
T02D1616:143b-8: bla re dag ni bre bar bya //
T02D1616:143b-9: sna tshogs gos ni dbyangs nas su //
T02D1616:143b-10: ba dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bya //
T02D1616:143b-11: g-yer ka dra bas mdzes par bya //
T02D1616:143b-12: gnas bcu dag ni kun du yang //
T02D1616:143b-13: de bzhin dri yi dkyil 'khor bya //
T02D1616:143b-14: mnyam med sems kyi dri yis ni //
T02D1616:143b-15: gru bzhi par ni byug par bya //
T02D1616:143b-16: lus la ste'u 'jog tsandan byug / sems ni mnyam par gnas pa ste //
T02D1616:143b-17: bzod pa'i me tog rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1616:143b-18: 'bad dang ldan pas dgram par bya //
T02D1616:143b-19: mnyam nyid bsgoms pa'i bdug pa yis /
T02D1616:143b-20: rang bzhin dag pas bdug par bya //
T02D1616:143b-21: shes rab mar me'i snang ba ste //
T02D1616:143b-22: khams gsum gyi ni mun pa rnams //
T02D1616:143b-23: mar me 'di yis bcom nas su //
T02D1616:143b-24: ci ltar 'dod bzhin snang bar bya //
T02D1616:143b-25: mchod pa dgram par byas nas kyang //
T02D1616:143b-26: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas su //
T02D1616:143b-27: aom badzra pr'a ka ra h'um phat /
T02D1616:143b-28: lag g-yon thal mo phar bstan te //
T02D1616:143b-29: g-yas pa khu tshur rgyab sbyar nas //
T02D1616:143b-30: dbang ldan phyogs tshogs bskor bar bya //
T02D1616:143b-31: ra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1616:143b-32: lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su //
T02D1616:143b-33: phan tshun chen mor reg par bya //
T02D1616:143b-35: dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1616:143b-36: g-yon pa khu tshur bcings nas su //
T02D1616:143b-37: mthe bong 'og tu brkyang bar bya //
T02D1616:143b-39: phur pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1616:143b-40: rnam par dag pa dang phan yon ni rgyud las shes par bya'o //
T02D1616:143b-41: rang gi snying ga'i zla dbus su //
T02D1616:143b-42: sa bon h'um gi 'od zer gyis //
T02D1616:143b-43: bla ma sangs rgyas snang byas la //
T02D1616:143b-44: tshigs bcad 'di ni brjod par bya //
T02D1616:143b-45: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni //
T02D1616:143b-46: bla ma'i zhabs lham la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1616:143b-48: sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1616:143b-49: 'od zer de las byung ba yi //
T02D1616:143b-50: lha mo lag na spos la sogs //
T02D1616:144a-0: thogs pas mchod pa byas par @144a * //
T02D1616:144a-2: sdig pa bgyis dang bgyid du stsal //
T02D1616:144a-3: rjes yi rang ba so sor bshags //
T02D1616:144a-4: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1616:144a-5: nyan thos rang rgyal ma lus dang //
T02D1616:144a-6: 'jig rten dge ba'i rtsa ba la //
T02D1616:144a-7: kun nas bdag ni yi rang ngo //
T02D1616:144a-9: myang na mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1616:144a-10: dus 'di nas ni sangs ma rgyas //
T02D1616:144a-11: bar du lam ni bsten bar bgyi //
T02D1616:144a-12: bdag gi lus kyang dbul bar bgyi //
T02D1616:144a-13: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni //
T02D1616:144a-14: dus 'di nas bzung ji srid du //
T02D1616:144a-15: byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar //
T02D1616:144a-16: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D1616:144a-17: yang dag byang chub nges mdzad pa //
T02D1616:144a-18: de bzhin bla med byang chub sems //
T02D1616:144a-19: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1616:144a-20: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor skyes sdom pa //
T02D1616:144a-21: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D1616:144a-22: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D1616:144a-23: deng nas brtsams te mchog tu bzung//
T02D1616:144a-24: bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang //
T02D1616:144a-25: dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang //
T02D1616:144a-26: sems can don ni tshul khrims gsum //
T02D1616:144a-27: bdag gis so sor brtan por gzung //
T02D1616:144a-28: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D1616:144a-29: rdo rje dril du phyag rgya yang //
T02D1616:144a-30: yang dag nyid du gzung bya zhing //
T02D1616:144a-31: slob dpon dag kyang bdag gis gzung //
T02D1616:144a-32: rin chen rigs mchog rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1616:144a-33: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D1616:144a-34: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02D1616:144a-35: sbyin pa rnam bzhi stsal bar bgyi //
T02D1616:144a-36: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D1616:144a-37: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa la //
T02D1616:144a-38: phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02D1616:144a-39: dam chos rab tu gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1616:144a-40: las gyi [*kyi] rigs mchog mthon po la //
T02D1616:144a-41: mchod pa ci nus pa gyi ba dang //
T02D1616:144a-42: sdom pa thams cad ldan par bgyi //
T02D1616:144a-43: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D1616:144a-44: dam pa de ni bskyed bgyi zhing /
T02D1616:144a-45: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D1616:144a-46: sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1616:144a-47: ma bsgral pa rnams bsgral pa dang //
T02D1616:144a-48: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
T02D1616:144a-49: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D1616:144a-51: byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang //
T02D1616:144a-52: btang snyoms bzhi po bsam par bya //
T02D1616:144a-53: de nas h'um gi me lce yis //
T02D1616:144b-0: snod bcud thams cad stong @144b par bsgom //
T02D1616:144b-1: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharma:sabh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D1616:144b-2: mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su //
T02D1616:144b-3: de yi dbus su bltas nas kyang //
T02D1616:144b-4: der ni mtshan ma brtag par bya //
T02D1616:144b-5: mar me'i 'od kyis zhi ba ste //
T02D1616:144b-6: dmar po rdul gyis rgyas pa'o //
T02D1616:144b-7: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba//
T02D1616:144b-9: mthar ni du ba nag mthong na //
T02D1616:144b-10: mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags //
T02D1616:144b-11: rlung gi mdog ltar 'khrug pa yis //
T02D1616:144b-12: de yi mod la bsgrag par 'gyur //
T02D1616:144b-13: zla ba dkar po'i 'od zer ltar //
T02D1616:144b-14: thams cad du ni dkar mthong na //
T02D1616:144b-16: blo ldan 'gro ba'i yang dag gnas /
T02D1616:144b-17: de yi nang du bsam pa ni //
T02D1616:144b-18: yum las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed //
T02D1616:144b-19: kshum las me yi dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02D1616:144b-20: de steng sum las chu rang bzhin //
T02D1616:144b-21: h'um las gser gyi sa gzhi dang //
T02D1616:144b-22: ri rab chen po bsam par bya //
T02D1616:144b-23: de steng h'um las gzhal yas ni //
T02D1616:144b-24: khang pa brtsegs pa bsam pa ste //
T02D1616:144b-25: gser las byung ba'i grong khyer mchog / rin chen bdun po rnams kyis spras //
T02D1616:144b-26: g-yer ka'i dra ba'i phreng ba dang //
T02D1616:144b-27: dra ba dra phyed sogs pas brgyan //
T02D1616:144b-28: dbus dang phyogs bzhir seng ge'i gdan //
T02D1616:144b-29: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan par //
T02D1616:144b-30: 'byung po glang po me mtshams su //
T02D1616:144b-31: rin chen bum pa gang ba'o //
T02D1616:144b-32: bden bral du ni ma he'i gdan //
T02D1616:144b-33: sbrul gyi gdan ni rlung mtshams su //
T02D1616:144b-34: sgo bzhir yi dags gdan dgod bya //
T02D1616:144b-35: dbus kyi nyi ma'i gdan steng du //
T02D1616:144b-36: rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi //
T02D1616:144b-37: h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o /
T02D1616:144b-38: aom badzra shuddha: sarba dharm'a badzra shuddho& ham /
T02D1616:144b-39: de las ye shes mkha' 'gro bskyed //
T02D1616:144b-40: sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung can //
T02D1616:144b-41: skra grol bas ni g-yogs pa ste //
T02D1616:144b-42: sangs rgyas lnga yis mdzes par byas //
T02D1616:144b-43: kha dog sngon po drag chen mo //
T02D1616:144b-44: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs //
T02D1616:144b-45: bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa yis //
T02D1616:144b-46: zhal gsum po ni spyan gsum mo //
T02D1616:144b-47: ha har bzhad cing 'jigs pa ste //
T02D1616:144b-48: na bza' dmar pos shin tu mdzes //
T02D1616:144b-49: kha tv'am gyen du bsgreng ba dang //
T02D1616:144b-50: gnyis pa na ni dgra sta nyid //
T02D1616:144b-51: gsum pa na ni rdo rje thogs //
T02D1616:144b-52: g-yon pa dril bu sgra sgrogs shing //
T02D1616:145a-2: gsum pa de bzhin ral gri 'phyar //
T02D1616:145a-4: dbus su mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya //
T02D1616:145a-5: aom yo ga shuddha:sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1616:145a-6: ye shes kyi ni shar phyogs su //
T02D1616:145a-7: bdag gi chu las byung ba yi //
T02D1616:145a-8: sum las rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgom //
T02D1616:145a-9: kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes //
T02D1616:145a-10: skra grol bas ni rnam par klubs //
T02D1616:145a-11: phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can //
T02D1616:145a-12: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1616:145a-13: phyag na kha tv'am rnal 'byor snod //
T02D1616:145a-14: shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' klubs //
T02D1616:145a-16: ye shes kyi ni byang gi shar //
T02D1616:145a-17: bdag gi me las byung ba yi //
T02D1616:145a-18: kshum las byung ba'i drag mor bskyed //
T02D1616:145a-19: kha dog ser mo shin tu mdzes //
T02D1616:145a-20: sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung bcas //
T02D1616:145a-21: skra grol bas ni brgyan pa ste //
T02D1616:145a-22: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs //
T02D1616:145a-23: sku la na bza' mdzes pa man bas //
T02D1616:145a-24: phyag gnyis kha tv'am rnal 'byor snod //
T02D1616:145a-25: ye shes kyi ni nub phyogs char //
T02D1616:145a-26: bdag gi rlung las byung ba yi //
T02D1616:145a-27: yum las mkha' 'gro ro langs ma //
T02D1616:145a-28: phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can //
T02D1616:145a-29: kha dog dmar po kun du 'od ;
T02D1616:145a-30: / kha tv'am rnal 'byor snod bsnams shing //
T02D1616:145a-31: skra grol bas ni mdzes pa ste //
T02D1616:145a-32: lus kun sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D1616:145a-33: shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol //
T02D1616:145a-35: ye shes kyi ni lha yi char //
T02D1616:145a-36: sa yi ye shes las byung ba'i //
T02D1616:145a-37: h'um las mkha' 'gro gtum mo bsgom //
T02D1616:145a-38: sems dpa' yi ni skyil krung can //
T02D1616:145a-39: kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes //
T02D1616:145a-40: kha tv'am rnal 'byor snod bsnams shing //
T02D1616:145a-41: rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste //
T02D1616:145a-42: skra grol bas ni shin tu mdzes //
T02D1616:145a-43: ha har dgod pas 'jigs par mdzad //
T02D1616:145a-45: dpal ldan gyi ni phyogs kyi chang //
T02D1616:145a-46: seng ge'i gdong ni bsam bya ba //
T02D1616:145a-47: kha dog dmar zhing ser ba ste //
T02D1616:145a-48: glang po yi ni stan la bzhugs //
T02D1616:145a-49: rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzub can //
T02D1616:145a-50: shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol //
T02D1616:145b-1: 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya //
T02D1616:145b-2: me mtshams bstab mo zhes bya ba //
T02D1616:145b-3: rin chen bdun gyi stan la bzhugs //
T02D1616:145b-4: phyag gnyis kha dog dkar zhing sngo //
T02D1616:145b-5: shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol //
T02D1616:145b-6: phyag na lcags kyus brgyan pa ste //
T02D1616:145b-7: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can //
T02D1616:145b-9: 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya //
T02D1616:145b-10: bden bral lha mo ce spyang mo //
T02D1616:145b-11: ha har bzhad pas 'jigs par mdzad //
T02D1616:145b-12: ma he yi ni stan la bzhugs //
T02D1616:145b-13: mdog ni dmar zhing sngo ba ste //
T02D1616:145b-14: sku la na bza' mdzes pa gsol //
T02D1616:145b-15: phyag gnyis lcags kyu zhags pa dang //
T02D1616:145b-16: sdigs mdzub kyis ni shin tu mdzes //
T02D1616:145b-17: sbrul gyis brgyan zhing rnam par klubs //
T02D1616:145b-19: 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya //
T02D1616:145b-20: rlung mtshams lha mo 'ug pa mo //
T02D1616:145b-21: kha dog ser zhing dmar ba ste //
T02D1616:145b-22: klu yi stan la yang dag bzhugs //
T02D1616:145b-23: rgyan yang de nyid sbyar bar bya //
T02D1616:145b-24: phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can //
T02D1616:145b-25: sdigs mdzub lcags kyu zhags pa bsnams //
T02D1616:145b-27: 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya //
T02D1616:145b-28: dbus kyi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyi //
T02D1616:145b-29: phyi rol dag ni rnam bzhi la //
T02D1616:145b-30: shar du mkha' 'gro phum las skyes //
T02D1616:145b-31: phyag gnyis kha dog dkar po ste //
T02D1616:145b-32: yi dags kyi ni stan la bzhugs //
T02D1616:145b-33: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis klubs pa ste //
T02D1616:145b-34: shin tu drag cing skra grol ba //
T02D1616:145b-36: lag gnyis kha ru bcug nas ni //
T02D1616:145b-37: ha har bzhad bas shin tu 'bar //
T02D1616:145b-38: byang du 'bar ma phem las bskyed //
T02D1616:145b-39: kha dog ser po shin tu drag / spyi bo'i steng du lag pa gnyis //
T02D1616:145b-40: thal sbyar me mar lta bur 'bar //
T02D1616:145b-41: drag po'i gzugs can 'tshigs pa ste //
T02D1616:145b-42: shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas brgyan //
T02D1616:145b-43: yi dags kyi ni stan la bzhugs //
T02D1616:145b-45: nub tu 'jigs byed phrom las bskyed //
T02D1616:145b-46: kha dog dmar mo 'jigs su rung //
T02D1616:145b-47: yi dags kyi ni stan la bzhugs //
T02D1616:145b-48: shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas brgyan //
T02D1616:145b-49: lag gnyis snyim par sbyar byas nas //
T02D1616:145b-50: khrag gi rgyun ni 'thung bar mdzad //
T02D1616:146a-2: 'jigs byed drag mo bsgom par bya //
T02D1616:146a-3: lho ru 'phrog byed phrim las byung //
T02D1616:146a-4: kha dog sngon po kun du 'od //
T02D1616:146a-5: yi dags kyi ni stan la bzhugs //
T02D1616:146a-6: skra grol bas ni brgyan pa ste //
T02D1616:146a-7: shin tu 'bar ba'i na bzas brgyan //
T02D1616:146a-8: sprul gyi rgyan gyis klubs pa ste //
T02D1616:146a-9: sdigs mdzub dang ni gtun shing thogs //
T02D1616:146a-10: sems can sems ni rmongs par byed //
T02D1616:146a-12: kun rig pas ni thams cad bsgom //
T02D1616:146a-13: de nas ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgyas bsrung bar bya ste //
T02D1616:146a-16: sna dang rna ba gnyis la yum ngo //
T02D1616:146a-22: de nas rang gi sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas /
T02D1616:146a-23: sangs rgyas la bskul bas lha mo mang po byung ste //
T02D1616:146a-24: dbu rgyan dang bum pa la sogs pas dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02D1616:146a-25: bdag gi dbugs kyi 'od zer gyis //
T02D1616:146a-26: mkha' 'gro ma rnams spyan drangs te //
T02D1616:146a-27: de dag gi ni gzugs mdun du //
T02D1616:146a-28: dam tshig rnams ni bstan par bya //
T02D1616:146a-29: khu tshur gnyis ni bcings nas su //
T02D1616:146a-30: dbu ma gnyis ni brkyang nas su //
T02D1616:146a-31: rtse mo phan tshun sprad nas ni //
T02D1616:146a-32: ye shes lha mo bstan par bya //
T02D1616:146a-33: lag gnyis phan tshun sbyar nas ni //
T02D1616:146a-34: dbu ma dang ni mthe bong sprad //
T02D1616:146a-35: cung zad cig ni bskyod par bya //
T02D1616:146a-36: shar phyogs rdo rje ma la bstan //
T02D1616:146a-37: khu tshur mnyam par bcings nas su //
T02D1616:146a-38: mthe bong gnyis ni brkyang byas la //
T02D1616:146a-39: byang gi phyogs nas brtsams nas su //
T02D1616:146a-40: rgya 'di drag mo la bstan bya //
T02D1616:146a-41: phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas su //
T02D1616:146a-42: mthe'u chung gnyis ni brkyang bar bya //
T02D1616:146a-43: nub tu gnas pa'i ro langs ma'i //
T02D1616:146a-44: phyag rgya ru ni sbyar bar bya //
T02D1616:146a-45: phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas su //
T02D1616:146a-46: gung mo gnyis ni brkyang bar bya //
T02D1616:146a-47: lho phyogs phyag rgyar bshad pa ste //
T02D1616:146a-48: de ni phyag rgya bzhi pa'o //
T02D1616:146a-49: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02D1616:146a-50: khro bo gnyis ni brkyang nas su //
T02D1616:146a-51: rtse mo sprad de gnas pa ni //
T02D1616:146a-52: mtshams bzhi yi ni phyag rgya yin //
T02D1616:146a-53: lag gnyis thal mo khar bcug nas //
T02D1616:146a-54: phum zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya //
T02D1616:146a-55: shar phyogs mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yin //
T02D1616:146a-56: lag g-yon thal mo kha sbyar nas //
T02D1616:146b-0: spyi bo ru ni gzhag @146b par bya //
T02D1616:146b-1: byang du gnas pa'i 'bar ma la //
T02D1616:146b-2: phyag rgya 'di ni bstan par bya //
T02D1616:146b-3: phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas su //
T02D1616:146b-4: kha ru bcug ste h'um zhes bya //
T02D1616:146b-5: nub phyogs lha mo 'jib byed ma'i //
T02D1616:146b-6: phyag rgya ru ni sbyar bar bya //
T02D1616:146b-7: lag gnyis kun du bskor nas su //
T02D1616:146b-8: sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo ru //
T02D1616:146b-9: gsang ba'i gnas su bzhag nas kyang //
T02D1616:146b-10: lho phyogs 'phrog byed ma la gnas //
T02D1616:146b-11: bskyed pa'i dus su brkyang pa ste //
T02D1616:146b-12: phyag rgya'i dus su aom dang ni //
T02D1616:146b-13: sv'a h'a'i bar du spel te bzlas //
T02D1616:146b-14: dam tshig lha mo rnams la ni //
T02D1616:146b-15: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02D1616:146b-16: g-yon pa snying gar gzhag nas su //
T02D1616:146b-17: g-yas pa mchan khung gzhug par bya //
T02D1616:146b-18: dam tshig sems dpa' rnams la bstan //
T02D1616:146b-19: sngags ni aom h'um sv'a h'a zhes so //
T02D1616:146b-20: de ltar ye shes sems ma dang //
T02D1616:146b-21: dam tshig sems ma rnams la ni //
T02D1616:146b-22: dam tshig so sor bstan nas kyang //
T02D1616:146b-23: gnyis su med par bsam par bya ;
T02D1616:146b-25: khro bo dang mthe bong sbyar la lhag ma brkyang ste /
T02D1616:146b-26: aom pushpa m'a le h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1616:146b-27: me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1616:146b-28: me tog gi phyag rgya las dbu ma bsgreng ba dang //
T02D1616:146b-29: aom dh'u pe shva ri h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa ni bdug pa'o //
T02D1616:146b-30: khu tshur las mthe bong brkyang ba dang /
T02D1616:146b-31: aom badzra t'ikshna d'i pa h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1616:146b-33: lag pa g-yas brkyang ba dang /
T02D1616:146b-34: aom gandhe h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa ni dri'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1616:146b-36: gung mo'i rtsar mthe bong bskyod pa dang //
T02D1616:146b-37: aom ku ru ku ru ma h'a pa li h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1616:146b-38: zhes bya ba ni gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1616:146b-39: phyi nas mchod pa nyi shu yis //
T02D1616:146b-40: ye shes can gyis mchod bar bya //
T02D1616:146b-41: h'um zhes bya ba'i glu blang zhing //
T02D1616:146b-42: rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes bar bya //
T02D1616:146b-43: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02D1616:146b-44: rked pa'i mtshams su bzhag nas ni //
T02D1616:146b-45: yan lag gsum du h'um gis bskyod mi wang tshul du bsgreng ba dang //
T02D1616:146b-46: gling bu'i tshul du 'bud pa dang //
T02D1616:146b-47: zangs dung tshul du 'bud pa dang //
T02D1616:146b-48: dkrol ba'i tshul du dkrol ba dang //
T02D1616:146b-49: pa ta ha ltar brdung ba dang //
T02D1616:146b-50: gar gyi tshul du bskyod pa dang //
T02D1616:146b-51: bsil yab tshul du g-yob pa dang //
T02D1616:147a-2: bla re'i tshul du bre ba dang //
T02D1616:147a-3: ba dan tshul du 'phyar ba dang //
T02D1616:147a-4: gdugs kyi tshul du dgab pa dang //
T02D1616:147a-5: rdza rnga'i tshul du brdung ba dang //
T02D1616:147a-6: rnga zlum tshul du brdung ba dang //
T02D1616:147a-7: 'dzum pa'i tshul du bzhad pa dang //
T02D1616:147a-8: khro bo'i tshul du khro ba dang //
T02D1616:147a-9: sgeg pa'i tshul du sgeg pa dang //
T02D1616:147a-10: 'gying ba'i tshul gyis rol pa dang //
T02D1616:147a-14: rnal 'byor ma brgyad de nyid kyis //
T02D1616:147a-15: dngos po kun gyis mchod par bya //
T02D1616:147a-16: h'um zhes bya bar bdag sprul nas //
T02D1616:147a-17: h'um gi glu ni blang bar bya //
T02D1616:147a-18: rgyud las byung ba nyid du ni //
T02D1616:147a-19: bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du bya //
T02D1616:147a-20: rdo rje'i de nyid dang ldan pas //
T02D1616:147a-21: tshigs bcad 'di yis blang bar bya //
T02D1616:147a-22: rdo rje gsor ba mdzes pa yis //
T02D1616:147a-23: sems can rnam thar bsgral bar bya //
T02D1616:147a-24: rnam thar chos su bya ba ste //
T02D1616:147a-25: rdo rje shin tu snying po mchog / de kho
T02D1616:147a-26: na nyid dang ldan pa'i dril bu 'dis blangs so
T02D1616:147a-28: aom badzra ghande h'um ho:pra ra ni ta sam pra
T02D1616:147a-29: ra ni ta sarba buddha kshe tra pra tsa li
T02D1616:147a-30: te / pradzny'a p'a rami t'a n'a tha sva bh'a
T02D1616:147a-31: be na badzra dha ra hri da ya aa wa
T02D1616:147a-35: gnas brgyang dril bu'i sgra bsgrags shing //
T02D1616:147a-36: rdo rje gsor te rang las byung ba'i lha mos bstod pa ni //
T02D1616:147a-37: lus can don phyir shes rab gsol btab pa //
T02D1616:147a-38: kun 'khyud la sogs gnyis kyis gnyis sprod cing //
T02D1616:147a-39: sgyu ma lta bur sbyor bas shing tu brgyan //
T02D1616:147a-40: srid pa las grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1616:147a-41: rdo rje dga' ba'i mthu dang spyan gyis gzigs //
T02D1616:147a-42: yi ge'i dngos po rang bzhin stong par rol //
T02D1616:147a-43: dngos dang dngos med las sgrol dbu mas mkhyen //
T02D1616:147a-44: mi 'gyur bcom ldan lhag ma sems pa'o //
T02D1616:147a-45: gnyis spyod kun 'khyud chu yi bya ba can //
T02D1616:147a-46: gnyis med chos brnyes thar pa brnyes pa'o //
T02D1616:147a-47: bde ba'i 'khor mnan thar pa btang ba'o //
T02D1616:147a-48: thams cad dngos kyi rnal 'byor ma sngags rol //
T02D1616:147a-49: rnal 'byor ma lnga sangs rgyas de nyid mkhyen //
T02D1616:147a-50: gzugs ma sgyu ma sems can smin mdzad pa //
T02D1616:147a-51: rdo rje kun rtog chos kyi rmongs pa gcod //
T02D1616:147a-52: rnal ma ma rmongs snying chos tshogs la 'dud //
T02D1616:147a-53: sems can sgrol mdzad rnal 'byor bdag la bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02D1616:147b-0: @147b thams cad bdag skyes ngo bo gcig la bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02D1616:147b-1: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rmongs pa gcod la bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02D1616:147b-2: de nyid gcig la rtag tu bdag 'dud bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02D1616:147b-3: rang dgar sems can dgrol ba yi //
T02D1616:147b-4: rgyu med dngos la 'dud par bgyi //
T02D1616:147b-7: ston ka'i zla ltar rab mdzes shing //
T02D1616:147b-8: dung ltar dkar ba'i sku 'dzin pa //
T02D1616:147b-11: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can //
T02D1616:147b-15: sgyu ma'i lus su thim pa yis //
T02D1616:147b-19: srid gsum 'bar ba'i sku ni rjes chags 'dul bar ldan //
T02D1616:147b-20: 'od zer rnon po stong ldan nyi ma stong 'drar ldan //
T02D1616:147b-21: rnam mang sku dang cha byad rjes chags sems dang ldan //
T02D1616:147b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug mchog rol gar mdzad pa //
T02D1616:147b-23: zhes bya bas khyad par du bstod cing glu dang bstod pas mchod pas mnyes par bya //
T02D1616:147b-24: bar bar du h'um gi sgra dang dril bu bsgrags la smon lam rnam pa gsum gdab par bya'o //
T02D1616:147b-25: rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas //
T02D1616:147b-26: snying ga'i phyogs su btsir bar bya //
T02D1616:147b-27: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D1616:147b-28: aom badzra shuddha: sarba dharm'a badzra shuddho& ham /
T02D1616:147b-29: aom yo ga shuddha:sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1616:147b-30: zhes brjod la lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas par bya'o //
T02D1616:147b-31: ting nge 'dzin gyis skyon sngags bzla ste /
T02D1616:147b-32: phreng ba de nyid dang ldan pas sngags 'dis sbyang ngo //
T02D1616:147b-33: aom pa te pa te ma h'um dzny'a na sarba
T02D1616:147b-34: buddha ma h'a ba be h'um h'um h'um ho ho
T02D1616:147b-52: zhes 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1616:147b-53: phyi nas las la sbyar ro //
T02D1616:147b-54: de nas langs par 'dod na smon lam gdab ste /
T02D1616:147b-55: ma lus sems can kun gyi phyir /
T02D1616:147b-56: smon lam dag ni gdab par bya //
T02D1616:147b-57: sems can thams cad nad med cing //
T02D1616:148a-0: @148a * // sems can thams cad bde gyur cig / gang gis lam la 'gro ba yis //
T02D1616:148a-1: sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog / ma brgal ba rnams bsgral bya zhing //
T02D1616:148a-2: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
T02D1616:148a-3: de ltar nyid du rjes brtse bas //
T02D1616:148a-4: rnal 'byor bstan bcos la gnas shog / gtor ma btang ba ni //
T02D1616:148a-5: dmar ba yi ni rdzas rnams kyis //
T02D1616:148a-6: mandala gru gsum byug bar bya //
T02D1616:148a-7: me tog dmar po bdug pa dang //
T02D1616:148a-8: dri dang mar me la sogs dbul //
T02D1616:148a-9: nye bar longs spyod gtor mar ldan //
T02D1616:148a-10: sha rlon dang ni nya sha sogs //
T02D1616:148a-11: bza' ba'i rdzas rnams thams cad la //
T02D1616:148a-12: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas par dgod //
T02D1616:148a-13: g-yon gyi cha ru snod gzhag la //
T02D1616:148a-14: g-yas kyi khro bo'i bstan par bya //
T02D1616:148a-15: ha zhes pa yis kha dog dbrog / ho zhes pa yis dri zhim ste //
T02D1616:148a-16: hr'i: zhes pa yis nus pa bskyed //
T02D1616:148a-17: go rims de ltar mngon par brjod //
T02D1616:148a-18: rnam gsum lan gsum brjod nas su //
T02D1616:148a-19: lha gsum du ni gsal bar bya //
T02D1616:148a-20: g-yas pa padma bsams nas su //
T02D1616:148a-21: g-yon pa rdo rje bsgrengs nas kyang //
T02D1616:148a-22: padma'i bskor ba bskor nas ni //
T02D1616:148a-23: phyag rgya chen po bstan par bya //
T02D1616:148a-25: phyag rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1616:148a-26: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02D1616:148a-27: rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya //
T02D1616:148a-28: mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgrengs nas su //
T02D1616:148a-29: mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya //
T02D1616:148a-30: g-yas pa cung zad bskum nas su //
T02D1616:148a-31: sbyar bas lha rnams spyan drang ngo //
T02D1616:148a-32: aom ku ru ku ru sa ma ya aa dhi pa ti h'um dza: sv'a h'a /
T02D1616:148a-33: spyan drangs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o //
T02D1616:148a-34: shing gcig la sogs brjod par bya //
T02D1616:148a-35: bdud rtsi lnga yis kha bkang nas //
T02D1616:148a-36: las kyi go 'phang mngon par bsam //
T02D1616:148a-38: las rnams thams cad sgrub byed cing //
T02D1616:148a-39: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02D1616:148a-40: rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya //
T02D1616:148a-41: mthe'u chung gnyis ni dkris nas su //
T02D1616:148a-42: khro bo dag tu sgrog tu sgrel [?] //
T02D1616:148a-43: aom tishtha tishtha h'um bhaksha bhaksha dza:phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1616:148a-44: ji bzhin la sogs sbyar byas nas //
T02D1616:148a-45: gtor ma la sogs sbyar bar bya //
T02D1616:148a-46: zhi dang rgyas dang dgug pa dang //
T02D1616:148b-0: @148b gsad bskrad dbye dang bcing ba dang //
T02D1616:148b-1: phyi rol gtor ma'i de nyid kyis //
T02D1616:148b-2: gtor ma'i las sogs pas bsgrub pas //
T02D1616:148b-3: mchog gi dngos grub 'dong rnams kyis //
T02D1616:148b-4: gsang ba'i gsang ba bsgom bya ba //
T02D1616:148b-5: lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas te //
T02D1616:148b-6: lte ba snying ga mgrin pa dang //
T02D1616:148b-7: mgo bo dang ni rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1616:148b-8: 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang //
T02D1616:148b-9: brgyad dang bcu drug rim pa ste //
T02D1616:148b-10: sum cu rtsa gnyis bsgom par bya //
T02D1616:148b-11: bde chen dang ni chos 'khor lo //
T02D1616:148b-12: thabs kyi cha ru shes par bya //
T02D1616:148b-13: sprul pa dang ni longs spyod gnyis //
T02D1616:148b-14: shes rab cha ru shes par bya //
T02D1616:148b-15: aom dang h'um dang aa dang ham //
T02D1616:148b-16: lte ba bzhi la dgong par bya //
T02D1616:148b-17: 'dab ma'i yi ge thams cad la //
T02D1616:148b-18: gtum mo me yi sbar thabs dang //
T02D1616:148b-19: bde ba bskyed pa'i rim pa ni //
T02D1616:148b-20: bla ma'i kha las rtogs par bya //
T02D1616:148b-21: ting 'dzin de las langs pa'i tshe //
T02D1616:148b-22: gzhan ni ci yang mi bsam par //
T02D1616:148b-23: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ni //
T02D1616:148b-24: mchog 'dod don la mos par bya //
T02D1616:148b-25: yang ni lha yi tshul gnas te //
T02D1616:148b-26: sgyu ma'i rnam pa bzhi ru brtag / mdor na mchog 'dod rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1616:148b-27: man ngag rim pa 'di nyid la //
T02D1616:148b-28: zas la bya ba ji bzhin du //
T02D1616:148b-29: ma yengs nan tan bskyed par bya //
T02D1616:148b-30: bdag 'dras brtson par nus pa ma yin yang //
T02D1616:148b-31: sems can dman pa rnams la phan gdags phyir //
T02D1616:148b-32: 'di byas bdud rtsi lta bu'i bsod nams kyis //
T02D1616:148b-33: thams cad kun gyis bden pa mthong bar shog /
T02D1616:148b-34: dpal gdan bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po
T02D1616:148b-35: bha ba bha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1616:148b-37: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ga ya dha ra dang /
